name: country_details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool geodb_cities.
Tool description: Get global city, region, and country data. Filter and display results in multiple languages.
API description: Fetches the details for a specific country from the GeoDB API, including information on the number of regions.

countryid.description: An ISO-3166 country code or WikiData id representing the country.

asciimode.description: If set to True, display results using ASCII characters.

languagecode.description: The language code to display the results in the specified language.
